author: Flame442
install_msg: Thanks for installing gameroles. Use `[p]help gameroles` for further help.
name: GameRoles
short: Grant roles when a user is playing a specific game.
description: Grant roles when a user is playing a specific game, and take them away when they stop. This can be used to create channels that can only be accessed by people who are currently playing a certain game, or who have ever played a certain game. This cog detects games by checking the status of the user, so users who use the privacy setting to disable statuses will not be granted roles. Run [p]gameroles to configure!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
